Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Red Sox have lost three of their last four games.
The New York Yankees have won three games in a row.
Boston is 4-9 in their last 13 games and they are third in the AL East.
New York is 6-2 in their last eight games and they are first in the AL East.
Brayan Bello has allowed two earned runs or fewer in three of his last five starts.
Gerrit Cole has allowed one earned run or fewer in four of his last five outings.
